name: Out of Clay (Mini Jam)
description:
This game controls with the WASD keys--right from the title screen, just move and have fun. If you're not sure what to do, try bumping into things.

This is my entry into Mini Jam 15, the theme for which was technology, and the limitation for which was a specific 8-color palette. I'm not totally sure I hit the theme to be honest; I ran a bit short on time to implement all of the tool building, fire starting, seed generating systems I envisioned. There are some of the ideas present though, in somewhat shortened forms.

Explore and transform the world around you as you find out where, what, and why you are.

PS - His name's Blobert. It's canon.
